comment._content: Judy forbes  my step mom  would love this and the story of moving it and all. She is a good hearted lady you could trust your life with.   I do shes married to my dad and you can get no more trusting than a father    she is  a good person that i care about,and love.   And she loves lighthouses. Just go in her kitchen lol it looks great !       Debi   brown  modesto california
